ageApi.name: ageApi
ageApi.title: Age API
checkList: Create a controlled input.
Send a request to the Age API.
Display the response from the Age API.
Create a cache so the same request is not sent twice.

checkedTree.name: checkedTree
checkedTree.title: Checked Tree
checkList: Render the data in a nested structure.
Clicking a parent should expand/collapse its children.
Search should filter out matching items.
Checking a child should check all its parents.
Unchecking a parent should uncheck all its children.
Clicking submit should console an array of all the checked items IDs.

/data.js.code:
const response = [
  { id: 4, parentId: 3, name: 'Days' },
  { id: 1, parentId: null, name: 'Years' },
  { id: 2, parentId: 1, name: 'Months' },
  { id: 5, parentId: null, name: 'Stars' },
  { id: 3, parentId: 2, name: 'Weeks' },
  { id: 6, parentId: 5, name: 'Sun' },
  { id: 7, parentId: 5, name: 'Proxima Centauri' },
  { id: 8, parentId: null, name: 'Dogs' },
]

export default response

swapOdds.name: swapOdds
swapOdds.title: Swap Odds
checkList: Render both lists to the screen.
Render a button to the screen.
When the button is clicked, swap the odds from the left list to the right list and vice versa.

ticTacToe.name: ticTacToe
ticTacToe.title: Tic Tac Toe
checkList: Render a tic-tac-toe board.
Clicking a cell should show player (x, y).
Switch players after each click.
Create win logic
If winner, console winner, restart game.

transferList.name: transferList
transferList.title: Transfer List
checkList: Render two lists and action buttons.
Clicking an action button should move the item to the other list.
